$eref.description: Base class for container with backup items. Containers with specific workloads are derived from this class.

___backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the container.

___healthStatus.description: Status of health of the container.

___registrationStatus.description: Status of registration of the container with the Recovery Services Vault.

$eref.description: Base class for backup policy. Workload-specific backup policies are derived from this class.

___protectedItemsCount.description: Number of items associated with this policy.

___storageTypeState.description: Locked or Unlocked. Once a machine is registered against a resource, the storageTypeState is always Locked.

___policyId.description: ID of the backup policy with which this item is backed up.

___sourceResourceId.description: ARM ID of the resource to be backed up.

___backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the backed up item.

___lastRecoveryPoint.description: Timestamp when the last (latest) backup copy was created for this backup item.

___workloadType.description: Type of workload this item represents.

___backupSetName.description: Name of the backup set the backup item belongs to

___createMode.description: Create mode to indicate recovery of existing soft deleted data source or creation of new data source.

___protectedItemId.description: Data Plane Service ID of the protected item.

___policyState.description: Indicates consistency of policy object and policy applied to this backup item.

___fabricName.description: Name of this backup item's fabric.

___protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

___sourceAssociations.description: Loosely coupled (type, value) associations (example - parent of a protected item)

$eref.description: Azure File Share workload-specific backup item.

___protectionStatus.description: Backup status of this backup item.

___lastBackupTime.description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

___lastBackupStatus.description: Last backup operation status. Possible values: Healthy, Unhealthy.

___friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the fileshare represented by this backup item.

___protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

___healthStatus.description: backups running status for this backup item.

___extendedInfo.description: Additional information with this backup item.

___protectionStatus.description: Backup status of this backup item.

___lastBackupTime.description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

___friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the VM represented by this backup item.

___protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

___healthDetails.description: Health details on this backup item.

___protectedItemDataId.description: Data ID of the protected item.

___virtualMachineId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the virtual machine represented by this item.

___extendedInfo.description: Additional information for this backup item.

___protectionState.description: Backup state of the backed up item.

___protectedItemDataId.description: Internal ID of a backup item. Used by Azure SQL Backup engine to contact Recovery Services.

___extendedInfo.description: Additional information for this backup item.

___lastBackupTime.description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

___parentName.description: Parent name of the DB such as Instance or Availability Group.

___protectedItemHealthStatus.description: Health status of the backup item, evaluated based on last heartbeat received.

___protectedItemDataSourceId.description: Data ID of the protected item.

___protectionStatus.description: Backup status of this backup item.

___lastBackupStatus.description: Last backup operation status. Possible values: Healthy, Unhealthy.

___parentType.description: Parent type of protected item, example: for a DB, standalone server or distributed

___friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the DB represented by this backup item.

___protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

___serverName.description: Host/Cluster Name for instance or AG

___extendedInfo.description: Additional information for this backup item.

$eref.description: Additional information on Backup engine specific backup item.

___isScheduledForDeferredDelete.description: To check if backup item is scheduled for deferred delete

___backupEngineName.description: Backup Management server protecting this backup item

___friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the managed item

___extendedInfo.description: Extended info of the backup item.

___protectedItemId.description: Data Plane Service ID of the protected item.

___policyState.description: Indicates consistency of policy object and policy applied to this backup item.

___fabricName.description: Name of this backup item's fabric.

___protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

___sourceAssociations.description: Loosely coupled (type, value) associations (example - parent of a protected item)

___isScheduledForDeferredDelete.description: Specifies if the item is scheduled for deferred deletion.

___friendlyName.description: Friendly name of this backup item.

___computerName.description: Name of the computer associated with this backup item.

___extendedInfo.description: Additional information with this backup item.

___policyId.description: ID of the backup policy with which this item is backed up.

___sourceResourceId.description: ARM ID of the resource to be backed up.

___backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the backed up item.

___lastRecoveryPoint.description: Timestamp when the last (latest) backup copy was created for this backup item.

___workloadType.description: Type of workload this item represents.

___backupSetName.description: Name of the backup set the backup item belongs to

___createMode.description: Create mode to indicate recovery of existing soft deleted data source or creation of new data source.

_88AzureIaaSComputeVMContainer.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing an Azure Resource Manager virtual machine.

___durationType.description: Retention duration type of retention policy.

___count.description:
Count of duration types. Retention duration is obtained by the counting the duration type Count times.
For example, when Count = 3 and DurationType = Weeks, retention duration will be three weeks.

___retentionDuration.description: Retention duration of the protection policy.

_88DPMProtectedItem.description: Additional information on Backup engine specific backup item.

___isScheduledForDeferredDelete.description: To check if backup item is scheduled for deferred delete

___backupEngineName.description: Backup Management server protecting this backup item

___friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the managed item

$eref.description: Additional information of DPM Protected item.

___protected.description: To check if backup item is disk protected.

___protectionGroupName.description: Protection group name of the backup item.

___lastBackupStatus.description: Last backup status information on backup item.

___isPresentOnCloud.description: To check if backup item is cloud protected.

___isCollocated.description: To check if backup item is collocated.

___lastRefreshedAt.description: Last refresh time on backup item.

___protectableObjectLoadPath.description: Attribute to provide information on various DBs.

___extendedInfo.description: Extended info of the backup item.

_88InquiryInfo.description: Details about inquired protectable items under a given container.

___status.description:
Inquiry Status for this container such as
InProgress | Failed | Succeeded

$eref.description: Error Detail class which encapsulates Code, Message and Recommendations.

___message.description: Error Message related to the Code.

___errorDetail.description: Error Details if the Status is non-success.

$eref.description: Details of an inquired protectable item.

___itemCount.description: Contains the protectable item Count inside this Container.

___type.description: Type of the Workload such as SQL, Oracle etc.

___inquiryValidation.description: Inquiry validation such as permissions and other backup validations.

___inquiryDetails.description:
Inquiry Details which will have workload specific details.
For e.g. - For SQL and oracle this will contain different details.

_88Settings.description: Common settings field for backup management

___isCompression.description:
Workload compression flag. This has been added so that 'isSqlCompression'
will be deprecated once clients upgrade to consider this flag.

___timeZone.description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

___instantRpRetentionRangeInDays.description: Instant RP retention policy range in days

___retentionPolicy.description: Retention policy with the details on backup copy retention ranges.

___timeZone.description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

___schedulePolicy.description: Backup schedule specified as part of backup policy.

___daysOfTheWeek.description: List of days of week for weekly retention policy.

___weeklySchedule.description: Weekly retention schedule of the protection policy.

___retentionScheduleDaily.description: Daily retention format for monthly retention policy.

___retentionScheduleWeekly.description: Weekly retention format for monthly retention policy.

___retentionScheduleFormatType.description: Retention schedule format type for monthly retention policy.

___monthlySchedule.description: Monthly retention schedule of the protection policy.

___retentionScheduleDaily.description: Daily retention format for yearly retention policy.

___monthsOfYear.description: List of months of year of yearly retention policy.

___retentionScheduleWeekly.description: Weekly retention format for yearly retention policy.

___retentionScheduleFormatType.description: Retention schedule format for yearly retention policy.

___yearlySchedule.description: Yearly retention schedule of the protection policy.

___dailySchedule.description: Daily retention schedule of the protection policy.

___daysOfTheMonth.description: List of days of the month.

___retentionScheduleDaily.description: Daily retention format for yearly retention policy.

___durationType.description: Retention duration type of retention policy.

___count.description:
Count of duration types. Retention duration is obtained by the counting the duration type Count times.
For example, when Count = 3 and DurationType = Weeks, retention duration will be three weeks.

___monthsOfYear.description: List of months of year of yearly retention policy.

___daysOfTheWeek.description: List of days of the week.

___retentionScheduleWeekly.description: Weekly retention format for yearly retention policy.

___retentionScheduleFormatType.description: Retention schedule format for yearly retention policy.
